name: Low-Pauly Blart 3
description:
Made in 48 hours for UAH's Shanty Jam Lv 5!

It's halloween night, and the mall is under attack by monsters who happen to look a lot like children in costumes.

It's your job ( mall cop ) to escort the children to safety, but make sure you fill out reports on all that damaged property while you're at it. You'll have to consult your clipboard and your minimap to get the information you need.

On top of all that, you need to make sure your sugar intake stays high. The children in the mall were in the middle of trick-or-treating (I think? We kind of lost the plot here) and will reward you for saving them with candy.

Developed by Mechelle Adams, Elizabeth Berhow, Cassandra Brown, and TJ Lagasse.
